insertion.description: Insertion Sort builds a sorted array one item at a time by comparing and inserting each element into its correct position, similar to sorting playing cards in your hands.

steps.1: Start with first element as sorted
steps.2: Take next element and compare it with all elements in the sorted portion
steps.3: Shift larger elements to the right to make space
steps.4: Insert the element in its correct position
steps.5: Repeat steps 2-4 until all elements are sorted

animation.nextKey: moving on to the next key...

task.title: Task 1 Step-wise value
task.description: Given the input array, fill in the values of array A after each for loop.
